Text:
Hey Exmnova. Whats up. 
I've been following your collection for a while now and must say its quite commendable how well you have stacked up.
I had a couple of requests for movies that are rather old. Would you be interested in uploading them? You'll surely be doing a big favour.
I was also recommended of you by another Pirate by the name Dias_Vld. But the movie did match his genre. Hes more into rough collection.
Keep up the good work !
